ARABIC: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but found in it only one house of Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But did not find more than a single family of believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: – and We did not find there any, apart from a single house of Muslims –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: but We found only one Muslim house.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We therefore found just one house over there that was Muslim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But We found not there any household of the Muslims except one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But We did not find therein save a (single) house of those who submitted (the Muslims).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: but We found not therein except one house of those that have surrendered themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But We found there but one house of those surrendered (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We found in it only one household of true believers --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We found not therein more than one house of the Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: but We did not find there other than one house of Muslims,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But We found not there any just (Muslim) persons except in one house:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But We found not there any household of the Muslims except one [i.e. Lout (Lot) and his two daughters].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But We found in it only one household of those who had surrendered themselves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But found in it only one household of Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:36]   but We did not find therein other than one house of those who had submitted [to God]: these were Lot and his two daughters. They have been described [here] with [the terms] ‘belief’ and ‘submission’ because they had affirmed [faith] in their hearts and used their limbs to perform acts of obedience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But We found there) in the townships of Lot's folk (but one house) but the inhabitants of one house (of those surrendered (to Allah)) of those close to Allah: Lot and his two daughters, Za'ura and Raytha.
